CourseCreditTransferAppln.name: CourseCreditTransferAppln
CourseCreditTransferAppln.description: Represents the details of a course credit transfer application.

ApprovedLearningEquivalencyId.description: The approved Learning Equivalency related to the Course Credit Transfer Application.

ApprovedLearningId.description: The approved Learning related to the Course Credit Transfer Application.

CaseId.description: The Case related to the Course Credit Transfer Application.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: The ISO code for the currency.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, the user might have only accessed this record or list view (LastReferencedDate) but not viewed it.

LearningAcademicSeason.description: The academic season of the learning for the Course Credit Transfer Application.

LearningAcademicYear.description: The academic year of the learning for the Course Credit Transfer Application.

LearningDuration.description: The duration of the learning for the Course Credit Transfer Application.

LearningDurationUnit.description: Specifies the duration unit of the learning for the Course Credit Transfer Application.

LearningIdentifier.description: The identifier of the learning for the Course Credit Transfer Application.

LearningLetterGrade.description: The letter grade of the learning for the Course Credit Transfer Application.

LearningName.description: The name of the learning for the Course Credit Transfer Application.

LearningNumericGrade.description: The letter grade of the learning for the Course Credit Transfer Application.

Name.description: The name of the Course Credit Transfer Application.

OwnerId.description: The identifier for the owner of the record.

Provider.description: The provider of the Course Credit Transfer Application.

RequestedLearningEquivalencyId.description: The requested Learning Equivalency related to the Course Credit Transfer Application.

RequestedLearningId.description: The requested Learning related to the Course Credit Transfer Application.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the Course Credit Transfer Application.
